Ragnar: Aff, they are. Both me and Katya Kerensky, another clan 
warrior, have decided to take their side. We believe they are a good 
choice.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:

> 
> "Has this group, the maximals, allies?"asdked Windlord
> 
> 
>

> >

tends 
> to

> > sources for mechs are almost limitless.

> protuberance.

> personnal 
> > matter, with all the time we left him. Let us go.

there

still
